nodes.bodyText: Just a question: Do you really need to add the inputFocused variable or is it redundant? I mean if the page isn't loaded, you shouldn't focus the input. And a use case where `this.inputFocused = true; this.loading = false) doesn't really play a role because you don't see the input

inputFocused is needed for after the page is actually visible, because losing the focus of the field triggers an update which triggers AfterViewChecked again, which then in turn focuses the field again, getting this stuck. We only care about focusing the input field once after the loading is done.
